terms.title: Terms of Service & Privacy Policy
terms.section1_text: Welcome to LLUVIA Member Portal. By registering, logging in, or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.
terms.section2_text1: Balance Top-up: Balance is for in-store consumption only, non-transferable, and non-refundable unless required by law.
terms.section2_text2: Points Rules: Points are rewards and cannot be exchanged for cash. LLUVIA reserves the right to adjust point rules.
terms.section3_text1: Public Display: To enhance social interaction, this system includes a 'Social Gallery'. You agree to display your nickname, avatar, level, and rank publicly.
terms.section3_text2: Privacy Protection: If you do not wish to display your avatar, please remove it in 'My Profile - Edit'. A default image will be shown.
terms.section3_text3: Personal Data: Your phone number is collected for account verification only and will not be sold to third parties.
terms.section4_text: LLUVIA is not liable for short-term service interruptions caused by network failures or system maintenance.

reset.request_info: Enter your registered email address to receive a password reset link.
reset.request_success: Password reset link sent to your email.
reset.request_failed: Failed to send link. Check your email address or network.
reset.reset_success: Password reset successfully! Redirecting to login...
reset.reset_failed: Reset failed. Link may be invalid or expired.

Recharge Rule 1: Recharge $300: Get 3x $50 Vouchers + Instant Upgrade to Silver!
Voucher Rule: Vouchers: Use one $50 voucher for every $180 spent.
Points Explain: Earn points for every $1 actual spent:
game.title: Liar's Dice
game.confirm_exit: Are you sure? This will reset the round counter.
tile.start_text: Cheers! Everyone drinks half a cup!
tile.bomb_text: WARNING! Finish ALL drinks on the table!
tile.toilet_text: Pause 2 turns. Drink 1 cup to bail out.
tile.pair_text: Pick someone you like to drink with you.
tile.shutup_text: No talking until your next turn. Talk = Drink.
tile.top_text: All Tops (1) drink 1 cup! (Double if deny)
tile.bottom_text: All Bottoms (0) drink 1 cup! (Triple if deny)
tile.back_text: Go back to Assembly (0 or 1) and drink again!
tile.rest_text: Free parking! Everyone rest one turn.
tile.luck_text: Roll a dice. Drink the number shown.
card.1: Dare: Text the 5th contact 'I'm lonely'. Or drink 2.
card.2: Mirror: Everyone make funny faces. First to laugh drinks 2.
card.3: Treat: Buy everyone a shot, and you drink 2.
card.4: Yell: Scream 'I am a Bottom/Top' 3 times. Or drink 2.
card.5: Chain: You and people on your left/right drink 1.
card.6: Lucky: Pick the best drinker to drink 2.
